mastery_screen.heading: Card Mastery
mastery_screen.intro: Each time you make it to the Vault, you'll get a chance to choose a new card to Master.
mastery_screen.byline: Each class has 10 Commons you can Master.

prerun_screen.heading: Prepare your Backpack
prerun_screen.intro: Before each delve into the Vault, you can add a Mastered Class Card to your Backpack.
prerun_screen.byline:
After a run where you reach the Vault, you'll have the ability to [k]Master[/k] one of 10 Class cards. Once [k]Mastered[/k], you'll be able to add one to your Backpack at the start of new runs.

You'll never be able to take the same card two runs in a row. The exception to this is the [k]Health Potion[/k], which is always available.

combo.name: Combo
combo.desc: If you have Combo and play a Swift Attack, the Swift Attack will trigger extra times equal to your Combo. These extra triggers apply every effect of the card, Void Stone included, and can even benefit from buffs (eg. Rage) or debuffs (eg. Vulnerable) applied earlier in the same Combo!

balanced.name: Balanced
balanced.desc: A Balanced card won't consume Combo when benefiting from it.

bleed.name: Bleed
bleed.desc: Bleed deals damage to enemies once a turn and goes down by 1 each time it triggers, whether normally or due to a card. The ability to deal repeated damage is kept in check by it triggering after enemy actions, meaning you'll still need to keep Block going.

corruption.name: Corruption
corruption.desc: Corruption is an ever-increasing resource you'll gain on a per-battle basis, usually from playing cards that give it directly, or 1 at a time whenever you Purge. Cards that interact with Corruption usually do a % of your Corruption as damage or Block, meaning they never stop growing stronger, but start off absurdly weak.

soultithe.name: Soultithe
soultithe.desc: When you first gain a point of Soultithe, you also gain a point of Corruption - and for every point of Soultithe you have at the start of each turn, you'll take a point of Threat. There are ways to lower it available, but you should be as focused on taking advantage of it - both the Corruption it gives, the cards enabled by Soultithe itself.

threshold.name: Threshold
threshold.desc: This is simply a check of whether you have a certain amount of Soultithe or not, often requiring you to have carried a bit over from the previous turn in order to trigger Threshhold effects without making your play order awkward.

sift.name: Sift
sift.desc: Discard from deck - triggering any effects you'd normally triggers by discarding from hand, you can also use this to simply eliminate cards you don't want to draw over the next couple of turns.

discard.name: Discard
discard.desc: Sends a card from hand to discard, triggering discard effects (but not Purge effects). You'll often find this in a 'Draw 1, Discard 1' format, where it allows you to trigger discard effects and refine what's in your hand, but not increase your overall card count.

recur.name: Recur
recur.desc: Pull a card of your choice from your discard straight to your hand.

deathstrike.name: Death Strike
deathstrike.desc: If you play an Attack and you have accumulated Death Strike equal to its cost, the Attack will trigger an extra time, and Death Strike will be reduced by that same cost (So a 3 cost Attack will both require and consume 3 Death Strike). Notably, this looks at the card's actual cost when played, not its 'base' cost.

chain.name: Chain
chain.desc: When you play a card, you gain Chain according to its type (Attack, Ability, Buff). Playing multiple of the same type in a row will add to the chain, whereas switching types will reset it. When the Chain hits 3, you enter Zen.

zen.name: Zen
zen.desc: Upon entering Zen, your next 5 cards played will cost 1 less, and trigger any Zen or Follow-Up effects they have. If you manage to play enough cards, you can trigger Zen multiple times in the same turn, but its effects won't last across turns.

opener.name: Opener
opener.desc: An effect that only triggers if it's the first card played in a turn, you'll find this complicating your plans to Chain, Follow-Up or just play other Opener cards pretty often, but there's a lot of high-impact effects available for cheap on Opener cards.

followup.name: Follow-Up
followup.desc: Requires the Chain to match the card in question's type - so if you're playing an Ability with Follow-Up, the Chain would need to be blue, indicating an Ability was the last card played. Being in Zen counts as having every type of Chain active for the purpose of Follow-Up.

futurestrike.name: Future Strike
futurestrike.desc: Damage of this type will accumulate on a target, and trigger at the end of the next even-numbered player turn (before Threat resolves). Future Strike benefits from Rage when it is applied (when the card is played), but benefits from Vulnerable when it resolves (at the end of a turn). Each time a creature has Future Strike triggered on it, it also suffers 1 Fatigue - and each time Future Strike is applied to a creature with Fatigue, it'll apply an extra time for each point of Fatigue on the target (So using '5 Future Strike, twice' against an enemy with 2 Fatigue would apply 5 Future Strike 4 times).

shii.name: Shii
shii.desc: Damage of this type will accumulate on a target, only triggering when Shii overwhelms their remaining HP, killing them - spreading half of the Shii they had accumulated evenly amongst other creatures. Shii can benefit from Rage, but not Vulnerable. When Shii on a creature is greater than half of its remaining HP, it also suffers 1 Fatigue - and each time Shii is applied against a Fatigued target, each instance of Shii added is increased by 1 for each point of Fatigue on the target.

fatigue.name: Fatigue
fatigue.desc: Fatigue is added by, and benefits, Shii and Future Strike in killing enemies. Aside from those, some other cards or artifacts may also have effects they trigger when a target is Fatigued, or increase in potency based on the total number of Fatigue stacks on enemies.

guardian_choice.header: The spoils of victory are yours to choose from...
guardian_choice.body_text: Choose a reward from the list below to aid in your crusade against The Void.

arkaos_choice.header: The Beast lies defeated before you...
arkaos_choice.body_text: As you turn to leave you notice 4 beads laying on the floor, snapped free from the creatures necklace.

stances.daze_locked: Stance switching locked. You have a Daze card!

006.name: Shield Wall
006.desc: [k]Block[/k] #d, equal to 15 plus 1 for each Ability played this turn.
006.up_desc: [k]Block[/k] #d, equal to [u]18[/u] plus [u]2[/u] for each Ability played this turn.

008.desc:
[k]Block[/k] 2 each time an Attack card is played.
[k]Expel[/k].
008.up_desc:
[k]Block[/k] [u]3[/u] each time an Attack card is played.
[k]Expel[/k].

014.name: Lacerations
014.desc: Each time [k]Bleed[/k] triggers, it will increase by 2. [k]Expel[/k].
014.up_desc: Each time [k]Bleed[/k] triggers, it will increase by 2. [u]Rigged.[/u] [k]Expel[/k].

029.up_desc: Deal [u]#a[/u] damage an amount of times equal to target's [k]Frenzy[/k] value.

036.up_desc: Each turn, Draw 1 the first time a [k]Block[/k] card is played. [k]Expel[/k].

The next card played this turn costs 0 Energy.

074.up_desc: [u]Gain 1 Energy[/u]. Swap your current Energy and Strength values.

078.up_desc: This turn, when a Hunted enemy is destroyed, reduce [k]Threat[/k] to 0. Draw 1.

091.up_desc: [k]Discard[/k] 1. Add [u]4[/u] copies of the Discarded card to the discard pile. [k]Expel[/k].

092.up_desc: Apply Hunted. This turn, when an enemy is destroyed, all other enemies gain [k]Weak[/k]en 2.

[k]Expel[/k].
224.up_desc:

[k]Expel[/k].

225.up_desc: This turn, dealing [k]Future Strike[/k] deals damage for the same amount.

[k]Trigger[/k] +1.

227.desc: Deal #a [k]Future Strike[/k], [f] times, to all enemies.
227.up_desc:
Deal #a [k]Future Strike[/k], [f] times, to all enemies.
[u]Chain 1.[/u]

228.name: Time Warp
228.desc: [k]Future Strike[/k] will trigger at the end of this turn.
228.up_desc:
[k]Future Strike[/k] will trigger at the end of this turn.
[u]Purge: Chain 1.[/u]

230.name: Flurry of Blows
230.desc:
Deal #a [k]Future Strike[/k] to a random enemy, [f] times.

230.up_desc:

[k]Purge[/k]: Deal [u]3[/u] [k]Future Strike[/k] to a random enemy.

231.name: No Time
231.desc:
Deal damage equal to [k]Future Strike[/k].
Set [k]Future Strike[/k] to 0.
231.up_desc:
[u]Apply [k]Vulnerable[/k] 1[/u].
Inflict damage equal to [k]Future Strike[/k].
Set [k]Future Strike[/k] to 0.

232.name: Mind Over Matter
232.desc: Put all cards with [k]Foresight[/k] cast on them from deck to hand.
232.up_desc:
Put all cards with [k]Foresight[/k] cast on them from deck to hand.
[u]Purge: Foresight 1.[/u]

233.name: Echoes of the Past
233.desc: Add 2 copies of a card from Discard to top of the deck. [k]Expel[/k].
233.up_desc: Add 2 [u]Upgraded[/u] copies of a card from Discard to top of the deck. [k]Expel[/k].

236.name: No Kando
236.desc:
Each time your deck is reshuffled, [k]Echo Wall[/k] 1.
[k]Expel[/k].
236.up_desc:
Each time your deck is reshuffled, [k]Echo Wall[/k] 1.
[u]Rigged.[/u] [k]Expel[/k].

237.name: Renewal
237.up_desc:
Swap your Deck and Discard.
[u][k]Purge[/k]: Chain 1.[/u].

238.name: Deceleration
238.desc: Apply [k]Slow[/k] 1. If target is already [k]Slow[/k], apply [k]Weak[/k] 2 instead.
238.up_desc: Apply [k]Slow[/k] 1. If target is already [k]Slow[/k], apply [k]Weak[/k] 2 [u]as well[/u].

240.name: Mix Up
240.desc:
Deal #a [k]Future Strike[/k], [f] times.
If target has no [k]Future Strike[/k], [k]Trigger[/k] +1.
240.up_desc:
Deal [u]#a[/u] [k]Future Strike[/k], [f] times.
If target has no [k]Future Strike[/k], [k]Trigger[/k] +1.

241.name: Memento Mori
241.desc:
Deal damage equal to half of target's [k]Future Strike[/k].
[k]Slay[/k]: [k]Transfer[/k] their [k]Future Strike[/k].
241.up_desc:
Deal damage equal to half of target's [k]Future Strike[/k].
[k]Slay[/k]: [k]Transfer[/k] their [k]Future Strike[/k].

242.name: Better Future
242.desc:
[k]Block[/k] #d, [k]Vision[/k] 1.
Upgrade the chosen card for the rest of the Battle.
242.up_desc:
[k]Block[/k] #d, [k]Vision[/k] [u]2[/u].
Upgrade the chosen [u]cards[/u] for the rest of the Battle.

245.name: State of Mind
245.desc: When entering [k]Zen[/k], deal 4 [k]Shii[/k] to all enemies.
245.up_desc:
When entering [k]Zen[/k], deal 4 [k]Shii[/k] to all enemies.
[u]Purge: Deal 2 Shii to all enemies.[/u]

247.name: Timeless
247.desc: This turn, all [k]Future Strike[/k] dealt will be converted to [k]Shii[/k].
247.up_desc: This turn, all [k]Future Strike[/k] dealt will be [u]additionally[/u] dealt as [k]Shii[/k].

249.name: Stance of the Tiger
249.desc:
At the start of each turn, add 2 [k]Swift Kicks[/k] to your hand.
[k]Expel[/k].
249.up_desc:
At the start of each turn, add [u]3[/u] [k]Swift Kicks[/k] to your hand.
[k]Expel[/k].

252.name: Stance of the Crane
252.desc:
At the start of each turn, add 2 [k]Mind Blasts[/k] to your hand.
[k]Expel[/k].
252.up_desc:
At the start of each turn, add [u]3[/u] [k]Mind Blasts[/k] to your hand.
[k]Expel[/k].

256.name: Mind Shield
256.desc:
Gain [k]Block[/k] and [k]Delay Block[/k] equal to half the total [k]Shii[/k] in play.
[k]Expel[k].
256.up_desc:
Gain [k]Block[/k] and [k]Delay Block[/k] equal to half the total [k]Shii[/k] in play.
[k]Expel[k].
[u]Purge:[/u] [k]Block[/k] 4.

257.name: Mind Shatter
257.desc:
Deal #a [k]Shii[/k].
[k]Solo:[/k] Deal damage equal to half of target's [k]Shii[/k].
257.up_desc:
Deal [u]#a[/u] [k]Shii[/k].
[k]Solo:[/k] Deal damage equal to half of target's [k]Shii[/k].

259.name: Calm
259.desc: [k]Foresight[/k] X, where X equals the number of enemies with Fatigue.
259.up_desc: [k]Foresight[/k] X [u](minimum of 2)[/u], where X equals the number of enemies with Fatigue.

262.name: Exhale
262.desc: Deal #a [k]Shii[/k] to a random enemy 5 times.
262.up_desc: Deal #a [k]Shii[/k] to a random enemy [u]7[/u] times.

264.name: Outpace
264.desc:
[k]Block[/k] #d.
[k]Block[/k] @d ($) for each stack of Fatigue across all enemies.
264.up_desc:
[k]Block[/k] [u]#d[/u].
[k]Block[/k] [u]@d[/u] ($) for each stack of Fatigue across all enemies.

265.name: Cohesion
265.desc:
[k]Block[/k] #d.
Zen: If you have 0 Energy, gain 1 Energy.
265.up_desc:
[k]Block[/k] [u]#d[/u].
Zen: If you have 0 Energy, gain 1 Energy.

269.name: Ceaseless
269.desc: Each turn, the first time you spend [k]Combo[/k], [k]Combo[/k] 1. [k]Expel[/k].
269.up_desc: Each turn, the first time you spend [k]Combo[/k], [k]Combo[/k] [u]2[/u]. [k]Expel[/k].

270.name: Debt Repaid
270.desc:
Deal #a damage.
[k]Purge[/k] & [k]Threshold[/k] 5: Deal 6 damage to a random enemy.
270.up_desc:
Deal [u]#a[/u] damage.
[k]Purge[/k] & [k]Threshold[/k] 5: Deal [u]8[/u] damage to a random enemy.

274.name: Abyssal Unity
274.desc:
[k]Block[/k] #d.
Apply [k]Vulnerable[/k] 1 to all enemies. Gain 2 [k]Corruption[/k].
[k]Threshold[/k] 13: Trigger +1.
274.up_desc:
[k]Block[/k] [u]#d[/u].
Apply [k]Vulnerable[/k] [u]2[/u] to all enemies. Gain [u]3[/u] [k]Corruption[/k].
[k]Threshold[/k] 13: Trigger +1.

276.name: One Step Ahead
276.desc:
[k]Block[/k] #d.
[k]Delay Block[/k] @d for each stack of Fatigue on target.
276.up_desc:
[k]Block[/k] [u]#d[/u].
[k]Delay Block[/k] @d for each stack of Fatigue on target.

286.name: Age
286.desc: Apply [k]Weak[/k] 1 for each Fatigue on the target. Apply [k]Slow[/k] 1 for each 2 Fatigue on the target.
286.up_desc: Apply [k]Weak[/k] 1 for each Fatigue on the target. Apply [k]Slow[/k] [u]and Vulnerable[/u] 1 for each 2 Fatigue on the target.

292.name: Reconciliation
292.desc:
Transfer all [k]Shii[/k] to the target.
[k]Slay[/k]: [k]Shii[/k] has 100% Death Transfer.
292.up_desc:
Transfer all [k]Shii[/k] to the target.
[k]Slay[/k]: [k]Shii[/k] has 100% Death Transfer.
[u]Purge: Deal 2 Shii to all enemies.[/k]

293.name: Run Ragged
293.desc: Apply 1 Fatigue to all enemies. Deal #a [k]Future Strike[/k], [f] times, to all enemies with at least 3 Fatigue. [k]Expel[/k].
293.up_desc: Apply 1 Fatigue to all enemies. Deal #a [k]Future Strike[/k], [f] times, to all enemies. [k]Expel[/k].

294.name: Reverb
294.desc:
Apply Fatigue to all enemies equal to [k]Echo Wall[/k].
Reduce [k]Echo Wall[/k] to 0.
294.up_desc:
Apply Fatigue [u]and deal Future Strike[/u] to all enemies equal to [k]Echo Wall[/k].
Reduce [k]Echo Wall[/k] to 0.

295.name: Calculated
295.desc:
[k]Future Strike[/k] now triggers every 3rd turn. Apply [k]Vulnerable[/k] 1 to all enemies each turn.
[k]Expel[/k].
295.up_desc:
[k]Future Strike[/k] now triggers every 3rd turn. Apply [k]Vulnerable[/k] 1 to all enemies each turn.
[k]Expel[/k].

296.name: Prophesized
296.desc: Deal #a [k]Shii[/k] a number of times equal to 9 minus this card's Energy cost.
296.up_desc: Deal #a [k]Shii[/k] a number of times equal to 9 minus this card's Energy cost.

297.name: Mind Game
297.desc: Deal [k]Shii[/k] to all enemies equal to target's [k]Future Strike[/k]. Set target's [k]Future Strike[/k] to 0.
297.up_desc:
Deal [k]Shii[/k] to all enemies equal to target's [k]Future Strike[/k]. Set target's [k]Future Strike[/k] to 0.
[u]Solo: Increase target's Shii by 25%[/u]

300.name: First Blood
300.desc:
If target is below 10 [k]Bleed[/k], deal #a damage.
Apply [k]Bleed[/k] @d.
300.up_desc:
If target is below 10 [k]Bleed[/k], deal [u]#a[/u] damage.
Apply [k]Bleed[/k] [u]@d[/u].

303.name: Exploit Vulnerability
303.desc:
Apply [k]Vulnerable[/k] 1.
Apply [k]Bleed[/k] equal to combined [k]Vulnerable[/k], [k]Weak[/k], and [k]Slow[/k].
303.up_desc:
Apply [k]Vulnerable[/k] [u]3[/u].
Apply [k]Bleed[/k] equal to combined [k]Vulnerable[/k], [k]Weak[/k], and [k]Slow[/k].

308.name: Agility
308.desc: Max [k]Combo[/k] is increased by 1 this turn. [k]Combo[/k] 1.
308.up_desc: Max [k]Combo[/k] is increased by 1 this turn. [k]Combo[/k] 1.

312.name: Slice in Twain
312.desc:
Deal #a damage to a target.
[k]Clot[/k] 5: Apply @d [k]Bleed[/k] to all other enemies.
312.up_desc:
Deal [u]#a[/u] damage to a target.
[k]Clot[/k] [u]4[/u]: Apply [u]@d[/u] [k]Bleed[/k] to all other enemies.

313.name: Once More, With...
313.desc: Your next non-Buff card this turn will [k]Trigger[/k] +1. [k]Inert[/k].
313.up_desc: Your next non-Buff card this turn will [k]Trigger[/k] +1. [k]Inert[/k].

314.name: Void Coin
314.desc: When Drawn: Block 3.n\Gain 1 Energy, Discard 1. Discard: Expel, Draw 1, Discard 1.
314.up_desc: When Drawn: Block 3.n\Gain 1 Energy, Discard 1. Discard: Expel, Draw 1, Discard 1.

315.name: Muted
315.desc: Effects that give [i]Hidden Blades[/i] create [i]Silent Shivs[/i] instead. [k]Expel[/k].
315.up_desc: Effects that give [i]Hidden Blades[/i] create [i]Silent Shivs[/i] instead. [k]Rigged[/k]. [k]Expel[/k].

316.name: Tax Evasion
316.up_desc:
[k]Block[/k] equal to your [k]Soultithe[/k].
[u]This turn, Soultithe-gaining effects only give Corruption instead[/u].

318.name: Maddening
318.desc:
Gain 2 [k]Corruption[/k].
[k]Purge[/k]: Deal 6 damage to a random enemy.
318.up_desc:
Gain [u]3[/u] [k]Corruption[/k].
[k]Purge[/k]: Deal 6 damage to a random enemy [u]and trigger Void Stone[/u].

320.name: Blood for Blood
320.desc:
Deal #a damage.
If you have lost health this Battle, [k]Trigger[/k] +1.
320.up_desc:
Deal [u]#a[/u] damage.
If you have lost health this Battle, [k]Trigger[/k] +1.

321.name: Dark Pulse
321.desc:
Deal 50% (%) [k]Corruption[/k] damage to all enemies.
[k]Slay[/k]: Gain 3 [k]Corruption[/k].
321.up_desc:
Deal [u]75[/u]% (%) [k]Corruption[/k] damage to all enemies.
[k]Slay[/k]: Gain 3 [k]Corruption[/k].

324.name: Dead to Rites
324.desc: [k]Discard[/k] 1. If it is an [k]Affliction[/k], apply [k]Weak[/k] 1 and [k]Vulnerable[/k] 2 to all enemies.
324.up_desc: [k]Discard[/k] 1. If it is an [k]Affliction[/k], apply [k]Weak[/k] [u]2[/u] and [k]Vulnerable[/k] [u]3[/u] to all enemies.

327.name: Allomancy
327.desc:
Deal #a Damage.
For each damage dealt, add a [i]Void Coin[/i] to Discard.
327.up_desc:
Deal #a Damage.
For each damage dealt, add a [i]Void Coin[/i] to [u]Deck[/u].

331.name: Haunted Familiar
331.desc:
Each time you [k]Discard[/k] a card, gain 1 [k]Corruption[/k].
[k]Expel[/k].
331.up_desc:
Each time you [k]Discard[/k] a card, gain 1 [k]Corruption[/k].
[k]Expel[/k].

332.name: Father's Wallet
332.up_desc: Add 3 [i]Void Coins[/i] to hand, [u]and 1 to Discard[/u].

333.name: Limit
333.desc:
While at 13 or more [k]Soultithe[/k], you no longer gain [k]Soultithe[/k].
[k]Expel[/k].
333.up_desc:
While at 13 or more [k]Soultithe[/k], [u]Soultithe-gaining effects only give Corruption instead[/u].
[k]Expel[/k].

334.name: Soul Roulette
334.desc:
Start of turn, if [k]Soultithe[/k] is even, [k]Sift[/k] 1.
If odd, Draw & Discard 1.
Then [k]Soultithe[/k] 1. [k]Expel[/k].
334.up_desc:
Start of turn, if [k]Soultithe[/k] is even, [k]Sift[/k] 1.
If odd, Draw & Discard 1.
Then [k]Soultithe[/k] 1. [k]Expel[/k].

335.name: Dark Reflection
335.desc:
Each turn, gain [k]Corruption[/k] equal to the Energy cost of first card played.
[k]Expel[/k].
335.up_desc:
Each turn, gain [k]Corruption[/k] equal to the Energy cost of first card played.
[u]Rigged[/u]. [k]Expel[/k].

336.name: Acquired Resistance
336.desc:
At the start of each turn,
[k]Threshold[/k] 6: [k]Block[/k] 6.
[k]Expel[/k].
336.up_desc:
At the start of each turn,
[k]Threshold[/k] 6: [k]Block[/k] 6.
[u]Rigged[/u]. [k]Expel[/k].

338.name: Cursed Scythe
338.desc:
[k]Rage[/k] 25%.
Deal 25% (%) [k]Corruption[/k] damage X times to all enemies.
338.up_desc:
[k]Rage[/k] [u]50[/u]%.
Deal 25% (%) [k]Corruption[/k] damage X times to all enemies.

339.name: Our Father
339.desc:
Add [i]Who Thrives in Evil[/i] to Discard.
[k]Expel[/k].

342.name: Last Whispers
342.desc:
[k]Expel[/k] the first card you discard each turn, then add 1 [k]Volatile[/k] copy of it in your hand.
[k]Expel[/k].
342.up_desc:
[k]Expel[/k] the first card you discard each turn, then add [u]2[/u] [k]Volatile[/k] copies of it in your hand.
[k]Expel[/k].

343.name: Forbidden Pact
343.desc:
Increase handsize by 1.
When you draw a card, suffer [k]Threat[/k] equal to its cost.
[k]Expel[/k].
343.up_desc:
Increase handsize by [u]2[/u].
When you draw a card, suffer [k]Threat[/k] equal to its cost.
[k]Expel[/k].

401.name: Strength Potion
401.desc:
At the start of each turn, gain 25% [k]Rage[/k].
[k]Potion[/k]. [k]Consumable[/k].

402.name: Draw Potion
402.desc:
At the start of each turn, draw an extra card.
[k]Potion[/k]. [k]Consumable[/k].

403.name: Energy Potion
403.desc:
At the start of each turn, gain 1 additional Energy.
[k]Potion[/k]. [k]Consumable[/k].

405.name: Exploding Bottle
405.desc:
Deal 10 damage X ($) times to all enemies, equal to your current Floor.
[k]Potion[/k]. [k]Consumable[/k].

407.name: Meteor
407.desc:
Deal #a damage. Deal @a damage to adjacent enemies.
[k]Purge[/k]: Deal 10 damage to a random enemy.
407.up_desc:
Deal #a damage. Deal @a damage to adjacent enemies.
[k]Purge[/k]: Deal 10 damage to a random enemy.

408.name: Potion of Stealth
408.desc:
Creatures will skip their first turn.
[k]Potion[/k]. [k]Consumable[/k].
This Potions effects do not stack.

502.name: Call to Blood
502.up_desc: Inflict Bloodshield # to all enemies. Trigger all Bloodshield.

504.name: Concentrated Blow
504.desc: Target enemy's Bloodshield is set to the combined value of all in play. All other enemies is then set to 0.
504.up_desc: Target enemy's Bloodshield is set to the combined value of all in play.

506.name: Power in Blood
506.desc: If an enemy has Bloodshield, gain 2 Strength. Otherwise, gain 3.
506.up_desc: If an enemy has Bloodshield, gain 3 Strength. Otherwise, gain 4.

507.name: Black Blood
507.desc: Deal damage to target enemy equal to its Bloodshield. Their Bloodshield is then reset.
507.up_desc: Deal damage to target enemy equal to its Bloodshield.

511.name: Response
511.desc: Each time an enemy plans an [k]Attack Action[/k], gain 1 [k]Volatile[/k] [i]Hidden Blade[/i]. [k]Expel[/k].
511.up_desc: Each time an enemy plans an [k]Attack Action[/k], gain [u]2[/u] [k]Volatile[/k] [i]Hidden Blade[/i]. [k]Expel[/k].

512.name: Redirect
512.desc: When reshuffling, deal 1 damage to a random enemy for each card. [k]Expel[/k].
512.up_desc: When reshuffling, deal [u]2[/u] damage to a random enemy for each card. [k]Expel[/k].

513.name: Something Extra
513.desc:
All [k]Swift[/k] Attack Cards played will also apply [k]Bleed[/k] 1.
[k]Expel[/k].
513.up_desc:
All [k]Swift[/k] Attack Cards played will also apply [k]Bleed[/k] [u]2[/u].
[k]Expel[/k].

515.name: Blood Siphon
515.desc: Remove all [k]Bleed[/k] from the target. Gain that much [k]Block[/k].
515.up_desc: [u]Trigger target's Bleed.[/u] Remove all [k]Bleed[/k] from the target. Gain that much [k]Block[/k].

950.name: Daze
950.desc: Dazes are added to the top of your deck. Unplayable.

951.name: Bane
951.desc:
This card is useless. It's a card of shame. Shame.
Unplayable. [k]Scrap[/k].

953.name: Raven's Curse
953.desc: When drawn, all enemies double their AP. Destroy.

955.name: Color of Madness
955.desc:
When Drawn, the Void Stone colour you'll recieve next will randomize.
[k]Scrap[/k].

956.name: Scar Tissue
956.desc:
Memories of past wounds. When Drawn, suffer 5 [k]Threat[/k] & lose 1 Strength.
[k]Scrap[/k].

957.name: Exhaustion
957.desc:
If in hand at the end of turn, suffer [k]Stun[/k] 1.
[k]Scrap[/k]. Unplayable.

958.name: Remorse
958.desc:
When drawn, 1 random card will be discarded.
[k]Scrap[/k]. Unplayable.

959.name: Remorse
959.desc:
If in hand at the end of turn, suffer
[k]Cripple[/k] 1.
[k]Scrap[/k]. Unplayable.

arkaos.name: Arkaos
arkaos.desc: Arkaos, Beast of the Elements, the avatar of their power, strides forward as yet another champion lost to the Void's inexorable corruption. Around its neck glows pendants of Earth, Fire, Wind, and Water - their once natural balance hangs tortured in the thrall of their captor.
arkaos.tips: A balanced fight. Has the ability to inflict Burning and gains large amounts of Fortitude.

jaws_of_death.name: Jaws of Death
jaws_of_death.desc: This creature is nothing beyond primeval, one that stalks these endless depths with no malicious intent other than an instinct to feed. It is ancient beyond knowing who not even The Void can claim as its master.
jaws_of_death.tips: This creature is Immune to Vulnerable, and can also occasionally heal from Bleed.

the_forged.name: Forged Soldier
the_forged.desc: Malice incased in the darkest obsidian; a golem forged with hatred syphoned from the spinning wheel of time. It exists simply to gorge itself on the sweet agony of frail mortality.
the_forged.tips: Interweaves Fortitude and AP gain with attacks, constantly escalating its threat while you wait for an opening.

scoutlight.name: Light of the Soulless
scoutlight.desc: A light in the dark should be a welcome sight. An offering of hope. A fleeting reprieve. But this pale luminosity offers only screaming madness for those that peer too deep into its baleful glow..
scoutlight.tips: This enemy is Immune while you have too many cards in hand, which it'll supplement with Dazes, forcing you to play slowly.

disciples_of_straw.name: Disciples of Straw
disciples_of_straw.desc: The Priest stands in the centre of endless field, surrounded by damned souls that sway in the vile winds of the whispering void far below. Perched on outstretched arms are the black winged congregation, that caw a blasphemous chant to yield the next soul harvest.
disciples_of_straw.tips: This creature will inflict Banes and deal damage based on cards drawn. When its Minions spawn, their AP is based off the current Battleround.

wicked_worshipers.name: Wicked Worshipers
wicked_worshipers.desc: In the damp, dark corners of the Vault, desperate souls will turn and swear devotion to the anything they sense may fill them with light. The Void is a crewl deity however - and the prayers of the few will often go unanswered.
wicked_worshipers.tips: Keep an eye on the Effigy getting buffed up for a big hit while it keeps you from targeting Attacks on its supporting allies.

ancient_beast.name: Ancient Beast
ancient_beast.desc: This creature is immune to Vulnerable.

blessed_plating.name: Blessed Plating
blessed_plating.desc: Ignores the first instance of damage or debuff applied each turn.
blessed_plating.short: Ignores the first instance of damage or debuff applied each turn.

grim_glow.name: Grim Glow
grim_glow.desc: While you have # or more cards in hand, this enemy is Immune.
grim_glow.short: While you have # or more cards in hand, this enemy is Immune.

dusk_flash.name: Dusk Flash
dusk_flash.desc: Adds # Daze(s) and then will Attack.

toxic_vapors.name: Toxic Vapors
toxic_vapors.desc: Adds 1 Daze and then applies Poison #.

tenebrous_haze.name: Tenebrous Haze
tenebrous_haze.desc: Adds 1 Void to your Deck, and then applies Fear #.
tenebrous_haze.short:
Add 1 Void to Deck.
Apply Fear #.

the_voids_darkness.name: The Void's Darkness
the_voids_darkness.desc: Adds 1 Bane and 1 Daze to your Discard.

the_voids_corruption.name: The Void's Corruption
the_voids_corruption.desc: Adds 1 Exhaustion card to your Discard.

i_serve_the_void.name: I Serve the Void
i_serve_the_void.desc: This enemy will die, healing the Void equal to this creature's remaining HP before doing so.
i_serve_the_void.short: Heal Void for remaining HP, then Die.

let_me_protect_you.name: Let Me Protect You
let_me_protect_you.desc: Will give all Minions Fortitude equal to 20% of their max HP.

let_me_inspire_you.name: Let Me Inspire You
let_me_inspire_you.desc: The Minion with the highest HP will gain Taunt 2.

let_me_soothe_you.name: Let Me Soothe You
let_me_soothe_you.desc: All Minions will be healed for 10% of their max HP.

let_me_shelter_you.name: Let Me Shelter You
let_me_shelter_you.desc: The Minion with the lowest HP will gain Evasive 2.

the_void_corrupts.name: The Void Torments
the_void_corrupts.desc: Will apply Fear # and then Attacks.

the_void_ignites.name: The Void Ignites
the_void_ignites.desc: Will apply Burning # and then Attacks.

the_void_reclaims.name: The Void Reclaims
the_void_reclaims.desc: Will apply Haunted # and then Attacks.

the_void_suffocates.name: The Void Suffocates
the_void_suffocates.desc: Will add # Bane(s) to your deck and then Attacks.

the_void_overwhelms.name: The Void Overwhelms
the_void_overwhelms.desc: Will apply Stun and Daze 1 and then Attacks.

the_void_weakens.name: The Void Weakens
the_void_weakens.desc: Will apply Vulnerable # and then Attacks.

the_void_infects.name: The Void Infects
the_void_infects.desc: Will apply Poison # and then Attacks.

the_void_decays.name: The Void Decays
the_void_decays.desc: Will apply Cripple 1 and then Attacks.

scapegoat.name: Scapegoat
scapegoat.desc: At the start of every turn, gains Taunt #. Reduces Taunt by 1 each time it's the target of an Attack card.
scapegoat.short: At the start of every turn, gains Taunt #. Reduces Taunt by 1 each time it's the target of an Attack card.

symbol_of_suffering.name: Symbol of Suffering
symbol_of_suffering.desc: Will Attack, and then lose 2 AP (to a minimum of 1).

praise_the_void.name: Praise the Void
praise_the_void.desc: Will increase Effigy's AP by # and also heal it for 10% of its max HP.

embrace_despair.name: Embrace Despair
embrace_despair.desc: Increase AP by +#, and will then suffer Bleed 4.

surging_magic.name: Surging Magic
surging_magic.desc: Increase AP by +# and Fortitude equal to 10% of its Max HP.

bathe_in_blood.name: Bathe in Blood
bathe_in_blood.desc: Will reduce Bleed by 50%, and then Heal equal to current Bleed value.

my_loyal_following.name: My Loyal Following
my_loyal_following.desc: Each time you draw a card that isn't a Void, you'll suffer # damage. If you draw a Bane, you'll suffer an additional 2 damage.

if_i_could_walk.name: If I Could Walk I'd Kick Your...
if_i_could_walk.desc: Much to his frustration, this Creature will do nothing.

the_void_fills_us_all.name: The Void Fills Us All
the_void_fills_us_all.desc:
Will gain 1 AP every turn and whenever negative conditions are reduced, they will tick down by #.
Will always be Evasive whilst his Minions are alive.

wind.name: Wind
wind.desc: You will Draw # cards. At the end of the turn, your hand will be discarded.

beast_of_the_elements.name: Beast of the Elements
beast_of_the_elements.desc: If you defeat this creature, its Arms will be defeated also.

shield_wall.name: Shield Wall
shield_wall.desc: All creatures gain Fortitude equal to 10% Max HP.

consume_blood.name: Consume Blood
consume_blood.desc: Will remove Bleed from all creatures, and inflict that much damage.
